about_the_game:
Explore the supernatural side of Earth-Prime! Bolster the Freedom League with a ghost of the American Revolution and the world's Master Mage. You'll need them to face a sinister adept of the arcane arts and survive a mysterious realm beneath the surface.

The Magical Mysteries Mini-Pack includes four new decks to expand your gameplay options:

  • Lantern Jack: A ghost of the American Revolution, his spectral form still haunts the streets of Freedom City. The light of his lantern burns blue with the light of truth, green with the light of justice, and purple with the light of vengeance as he watches over the world of the living.
  • Eldritch:Originally an archeologist in the 1930s, he is now the world’s Master Mage. Eldritch is an ally of the Freedom League and provides Earth-Prime’s first line of defense against mystical threats.
  • Malador the Mystic: An adept of the arcane arts, he earned the title of Master Mage in Atlantis millennia ago but betrayed his oath and his duty to humanity. Malador bargained with unspeakable evil entities from other dimensions, seeking power, knowledge, and eternal life above all else. Can the Freedom League stop his sinister plans?
  • Sub-Terra: A strange realm deep beneath Earth-Prime, where the Serpent People and the Morlocks engaged in a long and brutal war. It is a place of monsters, myths, and menaces spawned from both science and sorcery that makes an engaging battleground for your heroes and villains.
